nodes.bodyText:
I think it's better to move this paragraph before ### Run an ES node manually and run the tests against it
and add a new paragraph here at the end to mention the --preserve-data for the ./gradlew :x-pack:plugin:eql:qa:correctness:runEqlCorrectnessNode:
#### Preserve data across node restarts
If you'd like to preserve the restored index and avoid the network download and delay of restoring them on every run of the node, you can start the node with:

```shell script
./gradlew :x-pack:plugin:eql:qa:correctness:runEqlCorrectnessNode --debug-jvm --preserve-data
```

I could do it myself in a followup PR though.
